ValidationRule.description: If the MSA requires a PO Number and the Opportunity PO Number field is blank, the Opportunity cannot move to Closed Won.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( ISPICKVAL( MSA_Contract__r.PO_Required__c , "Mandatory"), ISBLANK( PO_Number__c ) , ISCHANGED( StageName ) , ISPICKVAL( StageName , "Closed Won") )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Stage cannot be Closed won, when the PO Number field is Blank and PO Required is Mandatory.
